Articles.Content:
Having problems understanding exactly what im doing wrong here, my Ship works on Kerbin but when I use it on the Mun I get this message. Any Ideas?

IMG]

Edited April 29, 2015 by andyw3d

Kerbins gravity was just enough the have the suspension low enough for the drill to make contact with the ground. on the mun not as much gravity higher the wheel suspension made the drill have no ground contact..
The drill can extend quite deep into the surface without causing a collision. You don't need to line the tip of it up with the surface.
